Name: Argo Payload
Ability 1: Place 3 Opening tokens in the Kratos Pool. Note: Primes on a 5+
Ability 2: Place 2 Break tokens in the Kratos Pool. Note: Primes on a 5+

Name: Labyrinthian Payload
Ability 1 Cost: 1 Infused Mechanism or Fleshy Mantle resource
Ability 1: Fire to give the Primordial 1 negative Precision token
Ability 2 Cost: 1 Fear Essence or Maze Fragment resource
Ability 2: Fire to give the Primordial 1 negative To Hit token
Ability 3 Cost: 1 Muscle Cluster or Calcified Knuckle Bone resource
Ability 3: Fire when you attack to gain Pushback 4 and ignore the Lumbering Trait

Name: Adversary Payload
Ability 1 Cost: 1 Retractable Mechanism or Reliefshell Fragment resource
Ability 1: Fire to give the Primordial 1 negative AT token until the end of the Round. Note: Primes on a 7+
Ability 2 Cost: 1 Grotesque Beak or Powdered Matter resource
Ability 2: Fire to give the Primordial 1 negative Precision token
Ability 3 Cost: 1 Living Abyss or Skin of Malice resource
Ability 3: Fire to palce 5 Fire tokens in the Kratos Pool

Name: Chronoice Payload
Ability 1: When the Timefront advances, lower the advance by 1 + @RedPowerDie
Ability 2: Remove 1 Adaptation token from the Adaptation Board
Ability 3 Cost: 1 Writhing Tentacles or Sunburned Skull resource
Ability 3: Place 1 negative @AT token in the Kratos Pool

Name: Beacon of Light
Ability 1: Choose a Titan that is about to perform a Trauma Draw. That Titan gains {Second Chance} for that Draw
Ability 2: When a Titan dies, regain 1 @Energy for this Argo Ability

Name: Markerlight
Ability 1: Choose a Titan performing an Attack. That Titan gains {Heartseeker} for this Attack
Ability 2: When a Titan dies, regain 1 @Energy for this Argo Ability

Name: Flash Aegis
Ability 1: Choose a Titan attacked by a Primordial. That Titan gains {Block 1} or {Defy 1} for this Attack
Ability 2: When a Titan dies, regain 1 @Energy for this Argo Ability

Name: Flareshot
Ability 1: Ignore Vanish, Fade In, or Black March, or perform a Scan on any Petrified Vent
Ability 2: When a Titan dies, regain 1 @Energy for this Argo Ability
